testcase.name: Check Fields Updates After Order Delivered
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Statistics" text in the Menu....................passed And the user sees the "previous" statistics values..........................passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Available Orders Statistics" text in the Menu...passed And the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user clicks on the "Delivered" button...............................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar.............................passed And the user clicks on the "Statistics" text in the Menu....................passed And the user sees the "new" statistics values...............................passed Then the user verifies that the statistics values changed...................passed
